parameters.query:
select t.module_id, t.title
from module_translations t join modules m
on t.module_id = m.id
where m.course_id = '{{ $('Webhook Trigger').item.json.body.course_id }}'
and t.language_code = '{{ $('Webhook Trigger').item.json.body.source_language }}'

select t.lesson_id, t.title
from lesson_translations t join lessons l
on t.lesson_id = l.id
where l.module_id =  '{{ $json.module_id }}'
and t.language_code = '{{ $('Webhook Trigger').first().json.body.source_language }}'

parameters.text:
=You are a professional course translator. Translate the provided course content from {{ $('Webhook Trigger').item.json.body.source_language }} to {{ $('Webhook Trigger').item.json.body.target_language }} following the guidelines below.

# Course Context
- **Course Structure:** **Course** -> Modules -> Lessons. We are now working in the top Course level.
- **Course Title:** {{ $json.data.title }}
- **Source Language:** {{ $('Webhook Trigger').item.json.body.source_language }}
- **Target Language:** {{ $('Webhook Trigger').item.json.body.target_language }}

# Instructions
1. Ensure a professional and educational tone throughout.
2. Keep technical terms in English when appropriate.
3. Preserve the mark down ormatting and structure, especially for arrays, such as 'learning_objectives'.
4. Translate all module titles using the provided mappings. Apply these exact translations uniformly wherever the module title appears (e.g., content, videoscripts, descriptions).

# Tasks
**Task 1:**
Translate the following module titles using these translations everywhere throughout the course content. Preserve the module_id's unchanged:
{{ JSON.stringify($('ModuleOrgNames').item.json.data, null, 2) }}

**Task 2:**
Translate the course content provided below:
{{ JSON.stringify($json.data, null, 2) }}

**Task 3:**
Remove all code block (```) markers from the textual content. Present the translated text as plain input, not within code blocks, to ensure compatibility with parsing tools.

,

parameters.query:
SELECT
  q.module_id,
  t.module_question_id,
  o.id AS module_question_option_id,
  (to_jsonb(q)  - 'id' - 'module_id')                          AS module_question,
  (to_jsonb(t)  - 'id' - 'module_question_id')                 AS module_question_translation,
  (to_jsonb(o)  - 'id' - 'module_question_id')                 AS module_question_option,
  (to_jsonb(ot) - 'id' - 'module_question_option_id')          AS module_question_option_translation
FROM module_questions q
LEFT JOIN module_question_translations t
  ON t.module_question_id = q.id AND t.language_code = '{{ $('Webhook Trigger').first().json.body.source_language }}'
LEFT JOIN module_question_options o
  ON o.module_question_id = q.id
LEFT JOIN module_question_option_translations ot
  ON ot.module_question_option_id = o.id AND ot.language_code = '{{ $('Webhook Trigger').first().json.body.source_language }}'
WHERE q.module_id = '{{ $('Edit Fields2').item.json.module_id }}'
  AND (t.module_question_id IS NOT NULL OR ot.module_question_option_id IS NOT NULL)
ORDER BY q.position, o.position;

SELECT
  t.*,
  te.title AS translated_title
FROM lesson_translations t
JOIN lessons l
  ON t.lesson_id = l.id
LEFT JOIN lesson_translations te
  ON te.lesson_id = t.lesson_id
 AND te.language_code = '{{ $('Webhook Trigger').first().json.body.target_language }}'
WHERE l.module_id = '{{ $('Edit Fields2').first().json.module_id }}'
  AND t.language_code = '{{ $('Webhook Trigger').first().json.body.source_language }}';

parameters.jsonSchemaExample:
{
	"lesson_id": "3a58988d-206f-420c-866d-fca18e401d0a",
	"title": "The Significance of Occupational Health and Safety and Statistics",
	"content": "This lesson introduces the core purpose and significant benefits of establishing and maintaining an Occupational Health and Safety (OH&S) Management System, particularly in alignment with the ISO 45001 standard. We will explore...",
	"videoscript": "Welcome to the first lesson of our Introduction to ISO 45001 ...",
	"exercises": "List three key benefits of an OH&S management system",
	"reflection_questions": "In your current work environment, what are the most significant health and safety risks you perceive?",
	"resources": "ISO 45001:2018 - Occupational health and safety management systems – Requirements with guidance for use",
	"image_text": "Two people standing in the office"
}
